lines.text: First we need some holy water, and some communion wafers.
Communion wafers? The stuff you get from the church? Am I going to hell for this?
People actually attend class at 7 in the morning? It's inhumane, it's anti-American.
Let's talk about blood, Mr. Vincent, it's very precious to me.

[after Charley apologizes for thinking that Regine and Belle were vampires]
Such a thing simply could not happen twice, Charley!
[Louie has just attacked Charley and Alex.]

[about Peter Vincent]
I never returned his calls. To tell the truth I'm a little scared...

[to Louie]
You were supposed to bite her on the neck.
Jerry Dandrige was a serial killer cult worshiper kidnapper. He abducted my friend Ed Thompson and my girlfriend Amy.
